json.companyDescription:
Stratacent is all about delivering world class IT solutions that are perfectly aligned to client needs, no matter how complex they may be. We are highly focused on our customers and our primary goal is to exceed expectations with every client who partners with us, with solutions that are innovative, practical and versatile enough to take their business to the next level.

Fast growing data streams make the world seem bigger, while at the same time, shrinking it to make it appear more inter-connected and accessible. Stratacent helps you put the data in order, make sense of it, and grow with your data. Our mission is to achieve this in two ways: through sophisticated technology and the in-depth specialized knowledge of our team.

Our team comprises of talented and motivated professionals who work as an extension of your in-house team when needed. We follow the highest standards of professional ethics, delivering quality on time every time. Across every project we strive to deliver reliable, scalable and agile solutions to clients‚Äô technology needs integrating our core values of excellence, commitment, collaboration and creativity.

Our offsite development center is located at 101 Hudson Street, a building covering 1.25 million square feet of space in a ‚ÄúClass A‚Äù office tower 42 stories high. Looming over the Hudson River waterfront and just 10 minutes from lower Manhattan, this center, positioned in a prime area, offers a visual treat with its award-winning architecture.
json.companySlogan: Data Driven Solutions

json.title: Design Ninja Internship
json.descriptionHtml:
Influur is redefining how advertising works ‚Äî through creators, data, and AI. Our mission is to make influencer marketing as measurable, predictable, and scalable as paid ads ‚Äî and we're building the tech that powers it. Backed by top-tier investors and trusted by global brands, we're scaling fast across music and culture.

We‚Äôre currently developing a next-gen platform that connects artists, brands, and creators through AI-powered matchmaking and campaign automation. If you're a designer who thrives in high-stakes environments and wants to push the boundaries of AI in advertising, this role is for you.

Your Skillset

  • Design sense and attention to detail.
  • Familiarity with tools like Figma, Canva, or Adobe Creative Suite.
  • Organized and efficient in managing design tasks and files.
  • Basic knowledge of branding, layout, and visual hierarchy.
  • Curious about design for social, product, and marketing.
  • Bonus: bilingual (English & Spanish) and interest in influencer culture.

You‚Äôre The Type Who

  • Loves visual design and is eager to learn by doing.
  • Wants to grow under the mentorship of experienced designer.
  • Eager to learn more about startups where speed and adaptability matter.
  • Feels excited to support a mission-driven product.

What We Offer

  • An unpaid internship with a flexible duration of up to 3 months.
  • Real-world experience working alongside our Lead Designer.
  • A seat at the table as we redefine how the most iconic record labels, artists, and brands go viral (think Bad Bunny).
  • Access to elite tools, AI copilots, and a team that builds daily at top speed.
  • Remote work flexibility in a fast-paced startup.

Influur is the first two-sided marketplace in the creator economy industry.

Unlike any other tool or platform, Influur‚Äôs robust network provides multiple solutions and business models for both brands and influencers. Our community maintains us unrivaled when it comes to creating efficient and authentic brand partnerships.

json.title: Business Development Representative
json.descriptionHtml:
About Us

AtCrescendo, we‚Äôre transforming customer experience with Augmented AI‚Äîa seamless blend of human expertise and AI automation that delivers better, faster, more scalable support. We‚Äôre not just changing how support works. We‚Äôre reshaping the economics of an entire industry.

The Role

We‚Äôre looking for a Business Development Representative (BDR) to join our ambitious, customer-obsessed sales team. As a BDR, you‚Äôll be on the front lines of our go-to-market motion‚Äîgenerating pipeline, identifying high-potential prospects, and sparking conversations with the most innovative teams in customer experience.

This is the perfect opportunity for a driven self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, high-growth environment and wants to develop into a world-class enterprise seller. You‚Äôll work closely with Account Executives, marketing, and leadership to build a foundation for long-term growth‚Äîboth for yourself and for Crescendo.

This is a remote position with flexibility in location, though proximity to major markets is a plus.

What You‚Äôll Do:

  • Generate Pipeline: Prospect into enterprise accounts through cold outreach, social engagement, and event follow-up. Identify key stakeholders and spark interest in Crescendo‚Äôs Augmented AI solutions
  • Qualify Opportunities: Understand customer needs, assess fit, and schedule discovery meetings with Account Executives. You'll be the first point of contact in a high-impact customer journey
  • Collaborate Across Teams: Work closely with sales, marketing, and operations to execute on campaigns, optimize messaging, and fine-tune outreach strategies
  • Master the Craft: Learn the ins and outs of Crescendo‚Äôs product and the CX/AI landscape. Gain deep knowledge of our ICP and how our solutions drive real business outcomes
  • Track & Optimize: Use tools like Salesforce and Outreach to manage your pipeline, track performance, and continually improve outreach strategies

What We Expect From You:

  • Experience: 1+ year in a sales, business development, or customer-facing role‚Äîideally in SaaS, AI, or CX
  • Drive to Win: You‚Äôre hungry to learn, eager to contribute, and motivated by measurable impact
  • Clear Communicator: Strong written and verbal communication skills. You can craft concise, compelling messages that resonate with busy decision-makers
  • Resilient and Resourceful: You‚Äôre energized by rejection, not discouraged. You try new approaches and are always optimizing
  • Collaborative: You enjoy working in a team setting and understand how to support and be supported by your peers
  • Growth Mindset: You‚Äôre coachable, curious, and excited to grow into more senior roles over time

What You‚Äôll Get In Return:

  • Competitive Base Salary with Uncapped Commission
  • Generous paid time off
  • Attractive benefits package including medical, dental, and vision
  • Training opportunities provided by Crescendo and outside entities
  • 1-on-1 coaching with feedback sessions, mentorship, and opportunities for cross-functional development

Why Crescendo?

  • We‚Äôre creating a new category: Augmented AI
  • Our growth has been explosive‚Äî0 to $100M+ in ARR in under a year‚Äîand we‚Äôre just getting started
  • Our model is built on outcomes, not buzzwords. That means we only win when our customers do
  • You‚Äôll join a high-performing, customer-obsessed team that values speed, creativity, and craft
  • We‚Äôre remote-first, people-first, and purpose-driven

Join us and help shape the future of customer experience.

Company Culture Is At Our Core

Our core values bring intention to our work and set the tone for our culture. From the partners we serve to the associates who work with us, we share a set of core values that guide our actions.

  • Care for others - Cooperate, empathize, and seek opportunities to put each other first
  • Embrace growth - Expand your mind by taking calculated risks, developing your skills, and staying open to change
  • Manifest trust - Trust is the bond that allows us to work at our highest levels, as members of a team, in a unified direction. It is continuously earned by delivering on our commitments
  • Take ownership - Doing the right thing should come naturally
  • Be humble - Seek guidance, receive feedback, ask questions, and listen to your colleagues

Crescendo is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We value diversity, inclusion, equity, and belonging and these pillars are at the heart of how we work together. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, Veteran status, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which the candidate is applying. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.

We are committed to the inclusion of all individuals and will make reasonable accommodations‚ÄØfor qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application process. ‚ÄØIf you require assistance or accommodations to participate in the job application or interview process, please contactcareers@crescendo.ai.

Powered by JazzHR

json.companyDescription:
There‚Äôs huge potential in the new chapter of AI-powered customer service. But it will only be captured by companies that can shake up the industry models that hold back innovation.

We‚Äôre a group of founders who have worked in customer experience for years. Our tech and our people have served billions of customers and provided exceptional service across the world. 

Crescendo is our vision for finally changing what‚Äôs held us back before. 

We‚Äôre combining the most advanced AI technology with the best human agents to provide a blended experience. We‚Äôre eliminating the separation between the contact center and the technology provider.  With everything orchestrated together, we can dramatically accelerate improvements to agent and customer experience.

That means customer service that‚Äôs more in sync, easier to manage, and more tightly integrated than ever before.

And our customers will only pay for positive outcomes. It‚Äôs a brilliant harmony of AI and CX.
json.companySlogan: Combining AI and human expertise to deliver top-quality customer experience

json.title: Freelance GenAI Developer - Prompt Engineering & Data Workflows
json.descriptionHtml:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

This is a freelance role for a project, and your typical tasks may include:

  • Develop and submit precise answers based on complex prompts, including coding, automation, and data processing tasks
  • Write and optimize Python scripts for data analysis, automation, and verification
  • Work with large datasets efficiently, ensuring data is clean and well-structured
  • Utilize various LLMs to generate advanced prompts and improve AI output quality
  • Format outputs in required structures such as Markdown, JSON, tables, etc
  • Identify and troubleshoot non-trivial technical problems related to AI workflows and integrations


How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You hold a Master's or Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or related technical fields.
  • You have a strong technical background and hands-on experience with LLMs and AI frameworks to enhance automation and problem-solving
  • You possess data analysis and automation skills, with experience in scripting (e.g., Python) for task efficiency
  • You are proficient in working with large datasets and integrating data from multiple sources
  • You are able to develop, test, and optimize AI-driven workflows and tools
  • Your level of English is upper-intermediate (B2) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift ‚Äî a space where innovation meets opportunity. We‚Äôre a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks ‚Äî ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let‚Äôs build the future of AI together, one task at a time.
json.companySlogan: Be the ‚ÄúI‚Äù in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects

json.title: Sr. Developer - AI & Automation
json.descriptionHtml:
About Netskope

Today, there's more data and users outside the enterprise than inside, causing the network perimeter as we know it to dissolve. We realized a new perimeter was needed, one that is built in the cloud and follows and protects data wherever it goes, so we started Netskope to redefine Cloud, Network and Data Security.

Since 2012, we have built the market-leading cloud security company and an award-winning culture powered by hundreds of employees spread across offices in Santa Clara, St. Louis, Bangalore, London, Paris, Melbourne, Taipei, and Tokyo. Our core values are openness, honesty, and transparency, and we purposely developed our open desk layouts and large meeting spaces to support and promote partnerships, collaboration, and teamwork. From catered lunches and office celebrations to employee recognition events and social professional groups such as the Awesome Women of Netskope (AWON), we strive to keep work fun, supportive and interactive. Visit us at Netskope Careers. Please follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter@Netskope.

About the position:

As a Senior Developer in Netskope‚Äôs Customer Solution Group (CSG), you will design and build AI-enhanced internal tools that improve customer, customer support and success workflows. You will work across GenAI (LLM assistants, RAG pipelines), cloud-native services, and automation platforms, owning backend systems end-to-end‚Äîfrom design to deployment. This is a hands-on role ideal for an experienced Python developer excited about applying AI to deliver innovative tools that empower our Support and Customer Success teams and ultimately world-class experiences to Netskope customers.

As a member of that team at Netskope, you will have an important role in the development of cutting-edge tools, of which some are AI-driven, with the opportunity to help shape the future of customer support technology.

Responsibilities:

  • Work in the implementation of applications that will improve Netskope Customer Experience even more, including:
    • GenAI/Large Language Model assistants;
    • Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines;
    • Workflow and process automation tools;
    • Agentic AI tools;
    • Troubleshooting and performance monitoring tools.
  • Own the delivery of such applications, from design and development to deployment and monitoring, following modern approaches for maximum productivity and quality.
  • Design, implement and maintain the features and backend components of such applications using Python and public cloud services (AWS and GCP).
  • Develop data pipelines and strategies for efficient data retrieval and processing to support such applications.
  • Help deploy and monitor the applications in public cloud environments.
  • Build clients/servers that consume/serve REST APIs, gRPC, etc.
  • Troubleshoot bugs and issues raised by internal customers.
  • Manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables in a fast-paced development environment.
  • Create and update the status of task tickets as needed, together with documenting and sharing relevant information about the tasks and deliverables.
  • Keep abreast of the latest technologies that could be used to improve the products.
  • Collaborate with other internal Netskope teams to drive individual tasks forward.

Job Requirements:

  • 6+ years of backend software development
  • Expertise in Python
  • Experience developing RESTful API services leveraging libraries such as FastAPI
  • Working knowledge of AWS components for application development and deployment
  • Experience with PostgreSQL and other modern database technologies
  • Experience with developing applications that use LLMs
  • Proficiency in prompt engineering for LLMs to achieve desired outcomes
  • Experience with Docker containerization Docker
  • Working knowledge of git
  • Experience with Agile methodologies
  • Experience using LLM-powered tools that assist development work (Github Copilot, etc.)
  • Knowledge of secure development practices
  • Energetic self-starter, with the desire to work in a dynamic fast-paced environment
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Additonal Requirements(Nice to have):

  • Expertise in Rust
  • Good understanding of AI/ML concepts, natural language processing (NLP), vector embeddings
  • Good understanding of evaluation processes of LLM applications
  • Good understanding of Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures.
  • Experience with vector databases (e.g., Qdrant, Weaviate)
  • Experience with GenAI frameworks and libraries (e.g., LangChain, LLamaIndex)

Education:

  • Bachelors or Masters degree preferred

Netskope is committed to implementing equal employment opportunities for all employees and applicants for employment. Netskope does not discriminate in employment opportunities or practices based on religion, race, color, sex, marital or veteran statues, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, genetic information, pregnancy (including childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), or any other characteristic protected by the laws or regulations of any jurisdiction in which we operate.

Netskope respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal information you share with us, please refer to Netskope's Privacy Policy for more details.

json.companyDescription: Netskope, a leader in modern security and networking, addresses the needs of both security and networking teams by providing optimized access and real-time, context-based security for people, devices, and data anywhere they go. Thousands of customers, including more than 30 of the Fortune 100, trust the Netskope One platform, its Zero Trust Engine, and its powerful NewEdge network to reduce risk and gain full visibility and control over cloud, AI, SaaS, web, and private applications‚Äîproviding security and accelerating performance without trade-offs.
json.companySlogan: Security and Networking Reimagined

json.title: Associate Manager, Lifecycle & Web Experience
json.descriptionHtml:
ABOUT POPPI

Soda's back. Like, actually back. The twist? It's better for you this time (and no lie, it tastes better, too)! Join the team that's reclaiming soda one mouthwatering drop at a time. Refreshing and juicy without unnecessary sugar, it's time to love soda again!

OUR VALUES

  • We keep it real: We keep our egos in check and our feedback honest so we can always stay real. You know, like our ingredients.
  • We are creators: We're disruptors who see and do things differently, which is why we changed the soda game forever.
  • We do it better, together: We're better when we do together. We have one shot to become the #1 soda, so we need to make it count (while taking care of each other along the way).

THE ROLE

poppi is seeking a highly organized and agile Associate Manager, Lifecycle & Web Experience to own both sides of our digital relationship with consumers: direct communications and web presence. You'll manage our email and SMS lifecycle programs while also serving as the key partner for all website content, design, and performance updates in collaboration with our creative team and external web development agency.

WHAT YOU'LL DO

  • Serve as project manager and facilitator for all web development and design initiatives
  • Act as the primary point of contact with our web development agency
  • Oversee site content updates, optimizations, QA/QC, and performance improvements in collaboration with internal teams (Creative, Media, PR, HR, IT, etc.)
  • Manage Shopify backend operations for merchandise (not beverage) product listings, inventory, and fulfillment
  • Support Shopify POS for IRL activations, college events, and merch pop-ups
  • Own lifecycle strategy and execution across email and SMS, including campaign calendar development, segmentation, testing, and performance tracking
  • Analyze and report on key KPIs across lifecycle and web platforms to inform optimization and growth strategies
  • Maintain alignment between brand priorities and customer-facing digital touchpoints
  • Stay on the pulse of emerging tools, trends, and best practices across digital lifecycle marketing and web experience

WHAT YOU BRING

  • Exceptional time and project management skills with an ability to juggle multiple priorities at once
  • Deep attention to detail, with an ownership mindset and strong follow-through
  • Strong collaboration and communication skills, both written and verbal
  • A balance of creative thinking and analytical rigor
  • High comfort level working cross-functionally in a fast-paced, ever-evolving environment
  • Advanced analytical skills for processing & producing complex reporting
  • Excel, PowerPoint, and AI skills preferred

YOUR BACKGROUND

  • 3+ years of experience in digital marketing or web operations, CPG or DTC brands preferred
  • Hands-on experience with Klaviyo and/or Attentive
  • Experience working with Shopify (and preferably Shopify POS)
  • Previous experience managing external development or agency partners
  • Strong understanding of lifecycle marketing best practices, including segmentation, automation, and testing frameworks
  • Familiarity with basic design principles, UX, and web analytics
  • Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or related field

ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS

  • Travel domestically for business related meetings up to 15%
  • Some lifting and the movement of moderate loads require 50-pound lifting requirement
  • Willingness and the ability to work outside of standard business hours, including evenings and weekends, based on business demands.

The above statements cover what are generally believed to be principal and essential functions of the job. Specific circumstances may allow or require some incumbents assigned to the job to perform a different combination of duties.‚ÄØ

COMPENSATION

Our comprehensive compensation package plays a big part in how we recognize you for the impact you have on our path to achieving our mission. For this role, the estimated base salary range is between $65,000 - $75,000. The actual base salary will vary based on various factors, including market, minimum wage requirements, and individual qualifications objectively assessed during the interview process. The listed range above is a guideline, and the base salary range for this role may be modified.

BENEFITS

poppi offers a comprehensive benefits package for full-time employees, including, but not limited to:

  • Paid Time Off (3 weeks)
  • 10 Paid Company Holidays
  • Medical, Dental, and Vision Benefits
  • Flexible Spending Account Plan
  • 401(k) Program
  • Paid Parental Leave
  • Life Insurance
  • Technology Allowance
  • Employee Assistance Program
  • Quarterly poppi Product Benefit

At poppi, we are committed to building a diverse and inclusive company. We seek to create a culture where everyone can belong. We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities, and perspectives.‚ÄØ

poppi is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not make hiring or employment decisions on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or genetic information, in compliance with applicable federal, state and local law.

Poppi Privacy Policy

json.title: Customer Solutions Engineer - US-Based
json.descriptionHtml:
At Dexory, we‚Äôre redefining warehouse automation through AI, robotics and real-time data. As we rapidly scale to meet demand from leading global logistics and retail companies, we need a highly agile, resilient and strategic supply chain to support our growth. Our mission is to become the most dominant force in warehouse automation and that includes building world-class operational infrastructure behind the scenes.

Role:

This is a high impact role to help ensure customer growth and success. This is a multi-faceted role with elements of Sales Engineering and Robot Deployment/Support. This role requires a customer facing professional that can mix technical and commercial skill to drive market expansion of Dexory solutions. You will play a key part in helping to deliver our product into our customers‚Äô hands; working closely with the commercial and engineering teams to support the sales and integration process.

Responsibilities:

  • Act as the main North American customer contact for deployment and installation of our hardware and software platforms.
  • Work with customers to schedule delivery and installation of hardware and software products, including mechanical, electrical, software, and network services.
  • Take part in customer site visits to execute the installation process, including system setup, configuration, calibration, and troubleshooting.
  • Maintain and facilitate communication with customers to resolve any technical issues with their installation of deployment processes.
  • Coordinate technical sales activities for prospective accounts, performing both in-depth and high-level technical presentations for customers and prospects.
  • Support existing customer site operations on a day-to-day basis as required.
  • Serve as a point of contact for escalated technical issues.
  • Support warehouse mapping, preventative maintenance, and system upgrades.

About you:

  • Comfortable with working with large data sets as well as troubleshooting issues on hardware and software products.
  • Strong communication skills and ability to explain technical concepts clearly and listen actively.
  • Adept at problem-solving, analytical thinking, and creative solutions.
  • Empathy and customer focus are crucial for understanding and meeting client needs.
  • Effective teamwork, interpersonal skills, and the ability to collaborate across departments are essential.
  • Understanding of Logistics and Ecommerce market a plus.
  • Experience with warehouse automation solutions, experience with WMS and related logistics business software a plus.
  • Competent with Google Suite and Microsoft Office.
  • Ability to work in a fast paced team environment.
  • Proficient English written and verbal communications skills required to collaborate effectively with internal and external teams.
  • This role will involve 20-40% travel to customer sites.

Benefits:

Starting from the interview process and continuing into your career with us, you will be working by our four Operating Principles:

  • Performance: High standards, outstanding results,
  • Impact: Big challenges, bigger results
  • Commitment: All in, every time
  • One team: One mission, shared success

Joining our team and company isn't just about expertise; it's about embracing uncertainty with ambition. We're crafting world-changing solutions, fueled by a passion to redefine what's possible. We will look for you to help create and shape the future of logistics solutions through our products, our culture and our shared vision.

You will also receive:

  • Medical
  • 401k
  • Share options

AAP/EEO Statement‚ÄØ

Dexory provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment. It prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, colour, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by local laws. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.

json.title: Director of Solutions
json.descriptionHtml:
About Transflo

Transflo delivers a transformative, end-to-end suite of logistics solutions‚Äîfrom Telematics & ELD to Workflow AI and TMS integrations‚Äîempowering carriers, brokers, shippers, and freight factors to automate workflows, improve visibility, and simplify compliance. As a rapidly growing transportation SaaS innovator, Transflo is committed to our team‚Äôs growth and inclusive culture.

Role Overview

As the Director of Solutions, you will architect and champion integrated solutions leveraging Transflo‚Äôs ELD hardware, telematics, TMS, integration platforms, and cutting-edge AI. You‚Äôll bridge the gap between market needs and product delivery‚Äîensuring fleets gain measurable improvement in safety, compliance, visibility, and operational efficiency. Reporting to the VP of Solution Engineering, you‚Äôll collaborate with cross-functional implementation teams, serve as technical thought leader for pre-sales and client health, and shape our roadmap with a customer-centric, data-informed mindset.

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategic Solution Management
  • Lead and deliver a suite of transportation software systems combining Industry leading mobile solutions, ELD/telematics, Workflow AI, TMS integrations, and emerging AI capabilities
  • Pre-Sales & Customer Engagement
  • Partner with Sales and Solutions Architects to create compelling POCs, demos, and technical proposals aligned to customer goals in fleet management, compliance, and data-driven operations.
  • Implementation Collaboration
  • Collaborate to manage solution delivery‚Äîfrom scoping to go-live‚Äîwith cross-functional teams (engineering, PM, , customer success, support). Ensure seamless integrations per customer specs and best practices.
  • Product Feedback & Roadmap Shaping
  • Capture and prioritize customer feedback, market trends, and competitive intelligence to influence Transflo‚Äôs product roadmap with new ELD, telematics, TMS, and AI features.
  • Act as a Trusted Advisor
  • Drive greater adoption and customer health collaborating with the Customer Success team. Help customers make informed decisions on feature use, scaling, and customization. Identify technical risks before they become blockers and work with internal teams to resolve them.
  • Thought Leadership
  • Present at industry events, collaborate on white papers and webinars, and promote Transflo‚Äôs technology leadership in ELD compliance, fleet telematics, AI-powered automation, and software integrations.
  • Team Development & Cross-Functional Mentorship
  • Build and mentor a high-performing solutions team, fostering collaboration, technical learning, and customer-first mindset.

Qualifications

Required Experience:

  • 3+ years in solutions/product/pre-sales/implementations for Transportation SaaS with ELD, telematics, or TMS focus.
  • Deep technical understanding of ELD software, API and TMS integration, and AI-driven workflow automation
  • Demonstrated success in deploying at scale‚Äîdesigning architecture, overseeing development, and coordinating with customers.
  • Strong communicator: capable with both C-level executives and technical teams; able to deliver executive presentations and product demos.
  • Data-informed mindset: analyze telematics and TMS data to inform solution design and extract business value (e.g. cost savings, compliance, productivity).
  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in engineering, Computer Science, Business, or related field.
  • Transportation industry experience (carriers, brokers, shippers).

Preferred:

  • Transportation industry experience (carriers, brokers, shippers).
  • Prior leadership of solutions or product pre-sales teams.
  • Familiarity with market-leading TMS platforms

json.companyDescription: Transflo¬Æ is a trusted industry leader in mobile, telematics, and business process automation solutions to the transportation industry in North America. Transflo‚Äôs‚ÄØcustomer-focused mobile and cloud-based technologies deliver real-time communications to fleets, brokers, factors, shippers, and commercial vehicle drivers, and digitize 800 million shipping documents a year, representing approximately $115 billion in freight bills and 2.2 million downloads of the Mobile+ app. Organizations throughout Transflo‚Äôs neutral ecosystem use the end-to-end solution suite and digital platform to increase efficiency, improve cash flow, and reduce costs. Headquartered in Tampa, Florida, USA,‚ÄØTransflo‚ÄØhas set the pace for innovation in transportation software for over 30 years. For more information, visit www.transflo.com.

json.title: Freelance GenAI Developer - Prompt Engineering & Data Workflows
json.descriptionHtml:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

This is a freelance role for a project, and your typical tasks may include:

  • Develop and submit precise answers based on complex prompts, including coding, automation, and data processing tasks
  • Write and optimize Python scripts for data analysis, automation, and verification
  • Work with large datasets efficiently, ensuring data is clean and well-structured
  • Utilize various LLMs to generate advanced prompts and improve AI output quality
  • Format outputs in required structures such as Markdown, JSON, tables, etc
  • Identify and troubleshoot non-trivial technical problems related to AI workflows and integrations


How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You hold a Master's or Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or related technical fields.
  • You have a strong technical background and hands-on experience with LLMs and AI frameworks to enhance automation and problem-solving
  • You possess data analysis and automation skills, with experience in scripting (e.g., Python) for task efficiency
  • You are proficient in working with large datasets and integrating data from multiple sources
  • You are able to develop, test, and optimize AI-driven workflows and tools
  • Your level of English is upper-intermediate (B2) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

Welcome to Mindrift ‚Äî a space where innovation meets opportunity. We‚Äôre a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks ‚Äî ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let‚Äôs build the future of AI together, one task at a time.

json.title: Vice President - Data Management - Healthcare
json.descriptionHtml:
Job Title: Vice President - Data Management (Healthcare and Life Sciences)

Location: US, Remote ( With travel 30-50%)

Vertical: Healthcare and Life Sciences


About the Role:

We are seeking a seasoned Vice President to lead AI consulting efforts in the Healthcare and Life Sciences sector. This role offers the opportunity to partner with C-suite executives to develop and implement AI-driven strategies that transform business models, enhance operational performance, and unlock growth. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of AI solutions, specifically in healthcare, and experience driving large-scale business transformations.


Key Responsibilities:

‚Ä¢ Develop AI strategies and solutions that drive business transformation and growth.

‚Ä¢ Lead complex engagements for large healthcare and life sciences organizations, providing innovative, tailored business and technology solutions.

‚Ä¢ Assess client needs using both traditional and creative methods, delivering actionable recommendations.

‚Ä¢ Oversee day-to-day client relationships, ensuring high-quality deliverables and successful project outcomes.

‚Ä¢ Play a central role in business development, including proposal creation and driving new opportunities.


Required Qualifications:

‚Ä¢ 15+ years of experience in healthcare consulting or working within healthcare organizations, focusing on business transformation, process improvement, financial planning, and service delivery models.

‚Ä¢ Proven experience delivering AI solutions, including Gen AI and Agentic AI, with a strong understanding of their impact on healthcare and life sciences.

‚Ä¢ Strong network with key stakeholders, including payers, providers, life sciences, and CIOs, and the ability to leverage these relationships for business development.

‚Ä¢ Expertise in leading large-scale healthcare transformations, involving process redesign, service model development, and technology implementation.

‚Ä¢ Extensive knowledge of digital technologies in healthcare, including process automation, predictive analytics, and data visualization.

‚Ä¢ Demonstrated leadership experience, particularly in managing teams and overseeing change initiatives.

‚Ä¢ Advanced proficiency with Microsoft Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access).

‚Ä¢ Exceptional critical thinking, analytical, and problem-solving skills.

‚Ä¢ Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a proven ability to build teams, drive consensus, and lead in ambiguous environments.

‚Ä¢ A track record of consistent career progression and increasing responsibilities.


Preferred Skills:

‚Ä¢ Deep expertise in assessing healthcare organizations and identifying key transformation initiatives.

‚Ä¢ Strong strategy, transformation, and technology fluency, with experience in cross-functional team leadership across healthcare, supply chain, HR, and IT.

‚Ä¢ Experience in proposal development, managing multi-workstream programs, and leading large, multi-functional teams.

‚Ä¢ Experience developing digital solutions and leading complex benchmarking studies to improve healthcare service delivery models.

‚Ä¢ Advanced degree (e.g., MBA) from a top-tier institution.


Education & Experience:

‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree from an accredited university.

‚Ä¢ MBA preferred.

‚Ä¢ 15+ years of experience in consulting or with a large healthcare organization, including managing CXO-level relationships in relevant sectors.

  • Program Snapshot
  • Duration: 3-6 months (full-time, paid)
  • Start date: July 2025 (flexible)
  • Location: Cairo or Riyadh
  • Tracks: Business Development, Strategy & Operations, Marketing & Growth, Customer Success.
  • Mentorship: Dedicated coach + bi-weekly leadership roundtables
  • Outcome: Fast-track to a full-time Business Analyst / Associate offer based on performance
  • Analyse markets, competitors, and user data to uncover growth opportunities
  • Build go-to-market materials and support enterprise sales pitches
  • Design dashboards to track OKRs, revenue funnels, and customer health scores
  • Coordinate cross-functional projects (product, engineering, marketing) and present findings to C-level stakeholders
  • Assist in onboarding new clients and run feedback loops to improve the Velents platform
  • Represent Velents.ai at career fairs, webinars, and HR-tech events
  • Fresh graduate (Class of 2023‚Äì2025) or final-year student in Business, Economics, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field
  • Undergrad with the best in-class skills

  • Strong written and verbal communication in English; Arabic is a plus
  • Curious about AI, HR-tech, and automation ‚Äì you keep up with trends and love experimenting with new tools
  • What We Offer
  • Competitive stipend plus performance bonus
  • Personal mentor and structured learning path (product, sales, growth, leadership)
  • Access to Velents‚Äô internal AI skills-assessment platform to boost your own profile
  • Flexible hours & ‚Äúremote-first‚Äù culture
  • Potential full-time offer and ESOP eligibility upon successful completion

json.title: Business Analyst - Fraud
json.descriptionHtml:
Lensa is the leading career site for job seekers at every stage of their career. Our client, NetGuardians, is seeking professionals. Apply via Lensa today!

Business Analyst - Fraud

Why you should join

Financial crime is getting smarter‚Äîwe're getting smarter faster. At NetGuardians and Intix, we're redefining how financial institutions detect and prevent fraud with powerful AI-driven analytics, wrapped in elegant, user-friendly platforms. As a Business Analyst, you'll sit at the intersection of technology and impact, helping translate fraud risk into system logic that really works. If you're motivated by meaningful challenges, real-world outcomes, and collaborative energy‚Äîyou'll fit right in.

What you will do

You'll bridge client needs and our intelligent fraud prevention platform‚Äîfunctionally, technically, and humanly.

  • Lead discovery workshops and advise clients on fraud detection and prevention approaches
  • Translate business processes and fraud typologies into precise functional specifications
  • Design and validate system configurations using rules, scenarios, and thresholds in our AI engine
  • Perform business acceptance testing and support user training for successful rollouts
  • Contribute to the evolution of our delivery practice, documentation, and fraud detection strategies

Who you are

If you are technically fluent and business savvy, we're looking for you.

  • Strong understanding of fraud prevention in banking (e.g. card fraud, internal fraud, social engineering, mule accounts)
  • Proficient with business analysis tools (e.g. Excel, PowerPoint, Word, Jira, Confluence) and confident managing documentation in structured ways
  • Comfortable working with structured data (SQL knowledge is a plus), APIs, and integration flows
  • Familiar with AI/ML-powered systems and the functional implications of automation and data-driven decision-making
  • Able to communicate clearly across stakeholders‚Äîbusiness users, data scientists, and developers alike

Who we are

NetGuardians and Intix are combining forces to set a new standard in financial crime prevention. By uniting Intix's financial data expertise with NetGuardians' AI technology, we're building plug-and-play solutions that help banks stop fraud before it happens. With clients and teammates across Europe, Asia, and Africa, we're collaborative, innovative, and driven by a shared purpose: protecting people, institutions, and economies from financial crime.

json.companyDescription:
What if we could take the search out of job search? This is the question
Lensa has been answering since launching in San Francisco, California in
August 2016. Using machine learning, we instantly provide companies with
candidates and match professionals with positions that fit their skills,
goals, personalities, and needs.
How does it work? Lensa applies complex algorithms that identify the
skills needed to succeed on a given job. Candidates can play computer
games that assess their work style, thus gaining insight into their strengths
while unlocking career opportunities.
The result: job search that puts people first while reducing the time and
cost of talent acquisition.

Lensa passed 10 million job seeker registrations in 2019, making the com-
pany one of the premier career platforms.

With teams in multiple U.S. locations and a 60-strong crew of developers
and data scientists at its R & D headquarters in Europe, Lensa is working
every day to share its transformative career technology with the world.
json.companySlogan: Make your move. Building careers that matter for job seekers and professionals.

json.title: AI/Machine Learning Engineer
json.descriptionHtml:
About Peraton

Peraton is a next-generation national security company that drives missions of consequence spanning the globe and extending to the farthest reaches of the galaxy. As the world's leading mission capability integrator and transformative enterprise IT provider, we deliver trusted, highly differentiated solutions and technologies to protect our nation and allies. Peraton operates at the critical nexus between traditional and nontraditional threats across all domains: land, sea, space, air, and cyberspace. The company serves as a valued partner to essential government agencies and supports every branch of the U.S. armed forces. Each day, our employees do the can't be done by solving the most daunting challenges facing our customers. Visit peraton.com to learn how we're keeping people around the world safe and secure.

Program Overview

About The Role

Peraton is seeking a detail-oriented AI/ML Engineer to design, test, and optimize prompts that improve the performance, accuracy, and safety of AI language models. for the Department of Defense (DoD) DMDC's Enterprise Law Enforcement Support Services (ELEs2). In this role, you will be key in designing, developing, and deploying cutting-edge machine learning solutions to address complex business challenges across DBIDS, IMESA, I2. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to grasp requirements, developing AI agents and performing prompt engineering. The ideal candidate has strong communication skills, creative problem-solving abilities, and a deep understanding of NLP concepts. This role involves close collaboration with AI researchers, developers, and product teams to fine-tune model behavior and enhance user interactions.

What You'll Do:

  • Architect and deploy cloud infrastructure solutions that are secure, scalable, and optimized for AI and machine learning workloads.
  • Collaborate with AI teams to understand computational needs and translate these into infrastructure requirements.
  • Monitor, manage, and optimize cloud resources to maximize performance and minimize costs.
  • Design and implement continuous integration and delivery pipelines for AI applications.
  • Develop automation scripts and infrastructure as code to streamline deployment and management tasks.
  • Document machine learning processes, methodologies, and results to facilitate knowledge sharing and collaboration.
  • Stay current with the most recent developments in machine learning research, methodologies, and technologies, integrating them seamlessly into our workflow.
  • Develop solutions that operate in DoD approved environments and architectures

Qualifications

Required Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree and 5 years' experience, MS/MA with 3 years of experience, PhD with 0 years of experience, 9 years in lieu of degree
  • Ability to Obtain Public Trust clearance
  • Must be a U.S Citizen
  • Familiarity in integrating AI models through APIs or SDKs
  • Experience with AI-assisted development tools like
    • GitHub Copilot
    • Codeium
    • Machine learning concepts
Desired Qualifications:

  • Software developer experience in leveraging AI in software development include:
    • NIPRGPT, CAMOCGP, OpenAI, TensorFlow
    • Prompt engineering
    • Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques
    • Experience with LLMs (e.g., GPT), NLP tools, and prompt design strategies.
    • Familiarity with Python or scripting languages is a plus.
    • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or Java
SCA / Union / Intern Rate or Range

Details

Target Salary Range: $104,000 - $166,000. This represents the typical salary range for this position based on experience and other factors.

EEO:Equal opportunity employer, including disability and protected veterans, or other characteristics protected by law.

json.companyDescription:
Do the can't be done.

At Peraton, we're at the forefront of delivering the next big thing every day. We're the partner of choice to help solve some of the world's most daunting challenges, delivering bold, new solutions to keep people around the world safer and more secure.

How do we do it? By thinking differently. We're not mired in the past. We look at all problems with fresh eyes. We look past the obvious to bring the best talent, tech, and ideas together to completely transform how things get done. So bring your unique ideas, your entrepreneurial spirit, and your drive to succeed and get ready to be part of something bigger. Get ready to do the can't be done.
________
Recruitment fraud is a growing trend where fraudsters have been known to attempt to use our name to trick job seekers with fake employment opportunities. This type of scam is typically carried out through fake job postings, fake websites, or email accounts claiming to be from Peraton. The intent of recruitment fraud is to gain access to your personal information, such as your banking information, credit card number, or social security number.

Please be aware that our careers site can be found at careers.peraton.com and our corporate site can be found at peraton.com.

To learn more about Recruitment fraud and what to expect and not to expect from a Peraton recruiter, please visit: https://careers.peraton.com/recruitment-fraud/
json.companySlogan: Fearlessly solving the toughest national security challenges.

json.title: Project Manager
json.descriptionHtml:
About Versapay üöÄ

For growing businesses that need to accomplish more with less, Versapay‚Äôs Accounts Receivable Efficiency Suite simplifies the invoice-to-cash process by automating invoicing, facilitating B2B payments, and streamlining cash application with AI. Versapay integrates natively with top ERPs, while allowing businesses to collect with a self-serve payment portal and collaborate with customers and teammates to resolve what automation alone can‚Äôt. Owned by Great Hill Partners, Versapay‚Äôs employee base spans the U.S. and Canada with offices in Atlanta and Miami. With 10,000 customers and 5M+ companies transacting, Versapay facilitates 110M+ transactions and $170B+ in payments volume annually

Think you might be the next Veep to join? Read on!!

Our Values

‚≠êÔ∏è We obsess over our customers.

‚≠êÔ∏è We help each other.

‚≠êÔ∏è We embrace diversity.

‚≠êÔ∏è We find better ways.

‚≠êÔ∏è We get things done.

‚≠êÔ∏è We own it.

How you‚Äôll make an impact here ‚Äì and on your career:

In this role, you will facilitate and support organizational readiness in the delivery of large-scale, cross-functional strategic and operational initiatives. As Versapay continues its rapid growth, the need for alignment and execution of these programs is crucial.

This is an excellent opportunity for a business-minded strategist with proven experience in building and delivering key programs. You will provide outside-in thinking, frame milestones and timelines, drive cross-functional alignment, tracking, and execution, and help solve roadblocks.

To accomplish this, you‚Äôll have experience managing cross-functional technical programs, as well as delivering products to market. In addition, experience in strategy consulting, or in operations at a SaaS and/or Payments company is highly preferred.

What You'll Do

  • Support and help manage cross-functional programs: Define program goals, frame workstreams and approach, establish roles & responsibilities and facilitate program routines to deliver in the most efficient way.
  • Drive progress and resolve roadblocks: Monitor and report on progress, identify and escalate issues, and work cross-functionally to address them proactively and creatively.
  • Ensure goals are met: manage timelines, track progress, analyze results, and ensure stated objectives are achieved. Assist with execution where needed, ensuring all aspects of programs are progressing smoothly.
  • Build and improve processes: Remove operational roadblocks, simplify, seek out, propose, and build new processes to help us achieve our objectives.
  • Lead with data: Partner with analytics and other teams to identify key insights, quantify opportunities/results, and ensure prioritization and capture of these opportunities.
  • Develop technical delivery plans which outline the milestones and check lists at various stages of the product delivery life cycle. Partner with product, design, analytics and engineering teams to develop project plans with technical activities.
  • Facilitate migrations and go-lives, inclusive of working with internal and external teams to develop migration / launch strategy, identify beta customers, develop communications and track go-to-market activities.
  • Support other strategic priorities: Support Product leadership on strategic and operational initiatives as required.

What You'll Bring To The Team

  • Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in a relevant field; PMP or similar project management certification is a plus.
  • Experience: 2-5 years, including proven track record of managing cross-functional and technical programs, as well as launching new products. This includes partnering with product, engineering, and other functions to define product roadmap and key milestones, managing beta programs, helping establish and track performance and product KPIs. Comfortable and proven experience working with clients and/ or third-parties outside of internal stakeholders. Related industry experience in Payments, and/or SaaS is a strong asset. Experience in large-scale migration critical.
  • Can-do Attitude: Optimistic style that creates positive working relationships, amplifies team culture, and fosters collaboration. Can-do attitude with out-of-the-box creativity when solving problems. Eager learner and motivated to grow.
  • Strategic mindset: Outcomes-focused mindset to determine effectiveness and ROI of programs, looking beyond the day-to-day to help reach big-picture goals.
  • Customer-value thinking: Relentlessly considers the value, impacts and needs of a customer (internal or external) when considering changes, risks, decisions and paths forward. Design thinking facilitation experience and mindset a bonus.
  • Business acumen: Ability to understand business drivers, client needs, and how they translate into value and actionable ideas.
  • Drive and follow-through: Excellent organizational skills, work ethic, and passion to deliver on commitments. Experience in leadership roles and eager to expand this skillset. Knowledge of what needs to be done and how to work with others to help make it happen.
  • Agility: Comfort with ambiguous and complex problems, and a flexible and open-minded approach to new challenges. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Data fluency: Affinity to work with data and insights, synthesize data, optimize, and make recommendations to a variety of audiences. Data-driven when solving problems and ideating.
  • Communication: Clear articulation of ideas to a variety of audiences, including at executive level. Ability to write, speak, and present in a compelling manner.

All Of Our Veeps Live Out Our Core Values

We look for excellence: individuals that are better than we are and not only meet our values but bring value to our teams.

Research shows that while men apply to jobs when they meet an average of 60% of the criteria, women and other marginalized folks tend to only apply when they check every box. Think you have what it takes, but not sure you check every box? Apply to the role anyways. We‚Äôd love to talk and determine together whether you could be a great fit!

We are committed to providing an environment that is inclusive and accessible. Versapay is an equal opportunity employer and considers all applicants for employment without discrimination. Please let us know if accommodation for the recruitment/interview process is required and we will work with you to make sure your needs are addressed.

json.companyDescription: Versapay is the platform that rewires AR by removing barriers from collecting and reconciling B2B payments, providing end-to-end cash flow clarity, ensuring businesses can manage working capital on their terms. By closing the loop for finance teams and their business systems, customers, and payment activity into a single intelligent ecosystem, Versapay transforms money matters into a data-driven advantage. With 10,000 customers and 5M+ companies transacting, Versapay facilitates 110M+ transactions and processes $170B+ in payments volume annually.
json.companySlogan: Make accounts receivable your competitive edge

json.title: Freelance GenAI Developer - Prompt Engineering & Data Workflows
json.descriptionHtml:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.

What We Do

The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.

About The Role

This is a freelance role for a project, and your typical tasks may include:

  • Develop and submit precise answers based on complex prompts, including coding, automation, and data processing tasks
  • Write and optimize Python scripts for data analysis, automation, and verification
  • Work with large datasets efficiently, ensuring data is clean and well-structured
  • Utilize various LLMs to generate advanced prompts and improve AI output quality
  • Format outputs in required structures such as Markdown, JSON, tables, etc
  • Identify and troubleshoot non-trivial technical problems related to AI workflows and integrations


How To Get Started

Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.

Requirements

  • You hold a Master's or Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or related technical fields.
  • You have a strong technical background and hands-on experience with LLMs and AI frameworks to enhance automation and problem-solving
  • You possess data analysis and automation skills, with experience in scripting (e.g., Python) for task efficiency
  • You are proficient in working with large datasets and integrating data from multiple sources
  • You are able to develop, test, and optimize AI-driven workflows and tools
  • Your level of English is upper-intermediate (B2) or above
  • You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
  • Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


Benefits

Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?

  • Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
  • Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
  • Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

json.companyDescription:
Welcome to Mindrift ‚Äî a space where innovation meets opportunity. We‚Äôre a pioneering platform dedicated to advancing the field of artificial intelligence through collaborative online projects. Our focus lies in creating data for generative AI, offering a unique chance for freelancers to contribute to AI development from anywhere, at any time.

At Mindrift, we believe in the power of collective intelligence to shape the future of AI. Our platform allows users to dive into a variety of tasks ‚Äî ranging from creating training prompts for AI models to refining AI responses for greater relevance.

Let‚Äôs build the future of AI together, one task at a time.
json.companySlogan: Be the ‚ÄúI‚Äù in AI with Mindrift. Work from anywhere on groundbreaking AI projects

json.title: Director, IT Business Systems and Applications
json.descriptionHtml:
At Reltio¬Æ, we believe data should fuel business success. Reltio‚Äôs AI-powered data unification and management capabilities‚Äîencompassing entity resolution, multi-domain master data management (MDM), and data products‚Äîtransform siloed data from disparate sources into unified, trusted, and interoperable data. Reltio Data Cloud‚Ñ¢ delivers interoperable data where and when it's needed, empowering data and analytics leaders with unparalleled business responsiveness. Leading enterprise brands‚Äîacross multiple industries around the globe‚Äîrely on our award-winning data unification and cloud-native MDM capabilities to improve efficiency, manage risk and drive growth.


At Reltio, our values guide everything we do. With an unyielding commitment to prioritizing our ‚ÄúCustomer First‚Äù, we strive to ensure their success. We embrace our differences and are ‚ÄúBetter Together‚Äù as One Reltio. We are always looking to ‚ÄúSimplify and Share‚Äù our knowledge when we collaborate to remove obstacles for each other. We hold ourselves accountable for our actions and outcomes and strive for excellence. We ‚ÄúOwn It‚Äù. Every day, we innovate and evolve, so that today is ‚ÄúAlways Better Than Yesterday‚Äù. If you share and embody these values, we invite you to join our team at Reltio and contribute to our mission of excellence.


Reltio has earned numerous awards and top rankings for our technology, our culture and our people. Reltio was founded on a distributed workforce and offers flexible work arrangements to help our people manage their personal and professional lives. If you‚Äôre ready to work on unrivaled technology where your desire to be part of a collaborative team is met with a laser-focused mission to enable digital transformation with connected data, let‚Äôs talk!



Job Summary:


The Director of IT Business Systems and Applications is responsible for overseeing and directing IT‚Äôs technology stack, its strategy, operations, and SaaS based applications. This position plays a key role in shaping the technology vision and ensuring alignment with the overall company business objectives.

The ideal candidate has a strong combination of strategic thinking, operational excellence, and a hands-on approach to delivering innovative and scalable technology solutions. This role will lead IT application management and operations, including the implementation and integration of information systems for digital transformation. A firm understanding of AI/ML based technologies and experience collaborating with leadership peers, senior executives, and go-to-market business owners are critical requirements.



Job Duties and Responsibilities:


Enterprise Application Services:

  • Oversee the Enterprise Application staff that configure and maintain IT‚Äôs corporate applications, ensuring they function optimally and align with business needs.
  • Manage relationships with software vendors, contracts, licenses, renewals, and key applications.
  • Lead the planning, implementation, and evaluation of new applications and major updates, coordinating with cross-functional teams to ensure successful delivery.
  • Govern the inventory and use of existing back-office applications and licenses across Reltio.
  • Ensure seamless integration of applications and use within the company‚Äôs tech ecosystem, optimizing workflows and data accessibility.


IT Strategy and Operations:

  • Develop and implement an IT applications systems strategy to support the company‚Äôs long-term business goals.
  • Lead the development and implementation of an application framework to ensure data integrity, privacy, and compliance.
  • Provide executive updates on IT roadmaps and projects, ensuring alignment with organizational priorities and fostering cross-functional support.
  • Plan and manage the IT budget, ensuring resources are allocated effectively to maintain operational efficiency while meeting strategic priorities.
  • Create program and project plans and drive execution to on time completion and cost.
  • Oversee the IT Enterprise Applications team to ensure high performance, reliability, scalability, and security of all systems and applications.
  • Drive continuous improvement in operational processes, ensuring adherence to best practices.
  • Promote a culture of secure based application literacy and empower staff to leverage AI capable applications as a strategic asset.
  • Define SMART based, quarterly goals and annual roadmap plans.
  • Lead a high-performing IT team, fostering a culture of accountability, innovation, and continuous learning.
  • Lead and manage the Jira based, IT change management processes.
  • Mentor and develop talent, providing opportunities for skill growth and career advancement.
  • Conduct quarterly staff check-in‚Äôs and annual performance reviews.


Skills You Must Have:

  • 7+ years of experience in a leadership role within business application and/or IT management.
  • Experience leading and managing global IT teams across different countries and cultures.
  • Minimum Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent IT leadership management experience
  • Proven track record of success in developing and implementing IT strategies that align with business objectives.
  • Strong understanding of business processes and applying technology and automation to improve them.
  • Awareness and experience with emerging technologies (e.g. AI, ML, automation)
  • Responsible for the governing of application and license management.
  • Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.
  • A business system acumen of processes and workflows (e.g. order to cash).
  • Experience with application SaaS spend management
  • An architectural and technical understanding of application and data integrations.
  • Experience with common, cloud-based, business applications and technologies (e.g., ERP, CRM, HRIS).
  • Create IT dashboards and reports based on project and operational KPI‚Äôs and metrics.
  • Strong understanding of IT security principles and best practices.


Skills That Are Nice to Have:

  • Experience leading IT Teams managing back-office systems (e.g. Google Workspace, Microsoft Azure, Okta, Jira, Slack)
  • Knowledge and experience with automated workflow systems (e.g. Bettercloud, Okta, Workato)
  • Process improvement methodologies (ITIL, Lean, Six Sigma)
  • Data analytics and business intelligence expertise
  • Enhanced cybersecurity knowledge
  • Project management certifications (PMP, Agile)
  • Experience creating and managing OKR and KPI programs
  • Strong financial acumen and budgeting skills

json.title: Chief Technology Officer
json.descriptionHtml:
NU Advisory Partners is conducting a search for a seasoned technology executive to lead engineering, product infrastructure, and AI innovation for a growing digital platform serving both individual and enterprise users. This executive will own the technical vision, scale a high-performing global team, and partner across functions to deliver intuitive, intelligent, and reliable user experiences. With a focus on operational excellence, product enablement, and data-driven decision-making, this role is critical to the company‚Äôs next phase of platform maturity and growth.


About NU Advisory Partners


NU Advisory Partners is an AI-native executive search and advisory firm specializing in senior executive, operating, and board roles, with deep expertise in private capital-backed environments.


We‚Äôre breaking the mold in an industry that hasn‚Äôt changed in decades, pairing a top-tier team with tech, data, and AI to make search smarter, faster, and built for how businesses move today. The result? A better experience for clients, candidates, and ourselves. With 2,000+ searches and deep industry expertise, we deliver high-touch service and leadership talent that drives long-term value.


Key Responsibilities


Technical Strategy & Engineering Leadership


  • Define and execute a scalable technical roadmap that supports platform growth and product development goals
  • Integrate AI capabilities across user-facing and internal applications, accelerating automation and personalization
  • Establish technical frameworks, quality standards, and agile processes to drive consistent execution across teams


Product Development & Innovation


  • Collaborate with product leadership to bring new features to life with speed, clarity, and user-centric design
  • Lead development of platform enhancements that support growing enterprise demand, including integrations and reporting tools


Team Leadership & Talent Development


  • Lead and grow a distributed engineering and AI team, fostering a collaborative, high-output culture
  • Drive performance management, talent planning, and ongoing development for engineering and technical staff
  • Elevate capabilities through strategic hiring, mentorship, and cross-functional alignment


Operational Excellence & Enterprise Enablement

  • Improve visibility, predictability, and accountability in engineering workflows and resource allocation
  • Introduce technical systems and automation that increase development velocity and reduce complexity
  • Partner cross-functionally to ensure infrastructure and data systems scale with evolving business needs


Executive Collaboration & Communication


  • Serve as a key technical voice within the executive team, providing insight into strategic planning and business tradeoffs
  • Communicate technical concepts clearly to internal and external stakeholders, including board members
  • Ensure cross-departmental alignment between technology, product, operations, and commercial functions


Qualifications & Experience


  • Senior leadership experience overseeing engineering and AI in fast-growing SaaS (ideally b2b2c) business ranging from $20-100M+ in revenue
  • Proven success integrating AI into consumer- or enterprise-facing platforms, with a strong grasp of model development and deployment
  • Experience leading distributed teams across geographies and time zones, with a track record of developing talent and building strong engineering culture
  • Operational mindset with ability to manage complexity, prioritize effectively, and scale systems for performance and reliability
  • Strategic thinker who can balance immediate delivery with long-term innovation
  • Bachelor's degree in CS or other technical field required


How to Apply:


  • Submit your resume.
  • Our team will review your application.
  • If your experience aligns with the role, we‚Äôll reach out to discuss the opportunity further.
  • Even if this role isn‚Äôt the perfect match, we‚Äôll add you to our talent network for future opportunities.


At NU Advisory Partners, we‚Äôre committed to identifying and placing exceptional leaders in roles where they can drive meaningful impact. If your background aligns with this opportunity, we invite you to apply.

json.title: Business Analyst
json.descriptionHtml:
Title:

Business Analyst ‚Äì Cybersecurity Audits

Employment Type:

Contract

Location:

Remote


Role Description:

Our client is seeking a skilled Business Analyst to join a Cybersecurity Audits team supporting compliance initiatives and audit processes. This individual will play a key role in ensuring adherence to regulatory standards such as ISO 27001, NIST 800-53, NIST 800-171, SOC 1, and SOC 2. The Business Analyst will collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders‚Äîlegal, compliance, and IT security teams‚Äîto enhance audit readiness and regulatory alignment. Reporting directly to the Director of Cybersecurity Counsel, this role also supports the adoption of AI-driven security and governance frameworks.


Minimum Requirements:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Information Security, Business Administration, or a related field
  • 3+ years of experience in cybersecurity audits, compliance, or risk management
  • Strong knowledge of ISO 27001, NIST 800-53, NIST 800-171, SOC 1, and SOC 2 frameworks
  • Familiarity with regulatory compliance and risk management principles
  • Excellent analytical, documentation, and communication skills
  • Proven ability to work independently in a remote environment while collaborating globally


Preferred Requirements:

  • Experience with AI-driven security solutions and compliance automation tools
  • Certifications such as CISA, CISSP, or ISO 27001 Lead Auditor


Responsibilities:

  • Serve as a liaison between cybersecurity, compliance, and legal teams to support audit initiatives
  • Conduct gap analyses and risk assessments aligned with various cybersecurity frameworks
  • Collaborate with IT and security to document and track compliance requirements
  • Prepare for and execute internal and external cybersecurity audits
  • Identify and recommend process improvements for enhanced audit readiness
  • Develop and maintain documentation, reports, and dashboards
  • Support implementation of AI-driven compliance monitoring tools
  • Stay current on regulatory and cybersecurity best practices
  • Facilitate cross-functional meetings to ensure alignment on compliance efforts


FTSi.Tech Disclosure:

FTSi.Tech serves as a staffing agency, not the end client for this position. Our mission is to connect candidates with superior career opportunities while delivering exceptional talent to our clients. We are committed to facilitating successful and mutually beneficial placements for both candidates and clients. Your Success Is Our Focus!
